actions_description: The application will need actions to get a user's profile information, get a user's tweets, get the list of users a user is following, get the list of users following a user, post a new tweet, and follow/unfollow another user.
query_actions_required: Query actions will be needed to retrieve user profiles, user tweets, and follower/following lists.

query_actions.name: getUserProfile
query_actions.where_used: Used on a user's profile page to get their profile details

arguments.name: username
arguments.docs: The username of the user whose profile to retrieve

workflow_steps.step: Retrieve the user record matching the provided username

query_actions.name: getUserTweets
query_actions.where_used: Used on a user's profile page to display their tweets
query_actions.docs: Retrieves a list of tweets posted by a user

arguments.name: userId
arguments.docs: The ID of the user whose tweets to retrieve

query_actions.returns: A list of the user's tweets

workflow_steps.step: Query the tweets table for all tweets with the provided userId

query_actions.name: getFollowing
query_actions.where_used: Used on a user's profile page to show the list of users they are following
query_actions.docs: Retrieves the list of users that a user is following

arguments.name: userId
arguments.docs: The ID of the user to get the following list for

query_actions.returns: A list of users that the provided user is following

workflow_steps.step: Query the follows table for all records with the provided userId as the followerId
For each follow record, retrieve the corresponding followed user details

query_actions.name: getFollowers
query_actions.where_used: Used on a user's profile page to show the list of users following them
query_actions.docs: Retrieves the list of users following a user

arguments.name: userId
arguments.docs: The ID of the user to get the followers list for

query_actions.returns: A list of users following the provided user

workflow_steps.step: Query the follows table for all records with the provided userId as the followedId
For each follow record, retrieve the corresponding follower user details

mutation_actions_required: Mutation actions will be needed for posting new tweets and following/unfollowing users.

mutation_actions.name: postTweet
mutation_actions.where_used: Used when a user posts a new tweet
mutation_actions.docs: Posts a new tweet by the authenticated user

arguments.name: text
arguments.docs: The text content of the new tweet

workflow_steps.step: Create a new tweet record with the provided text and the ID of the authenticated user

mutation_actions.name: followUser
mutation_actions.where_used: Used when a user follows another user
mutation_actions.docs: Creates a follow relationship from the authenticated user to another user

arguments.name: userId
arguments.docs: The ID of the user to follow

workflow_steps.step: Create a new follow record with the authenticated user's ID as followerId and the provided userId as followedId

mutation_actions.name: unfollowUser
mutation_actions.where_used: Used when a user unfollows another user
mutation_actions.docs: Removes a follow relationship from the authenticated user to another user

arguments.name: userId
arguments.docs: The ID of the user to unfollow

workflow_steps.step: Delete the follow record with the authenticated user's ID as followerId and the provided userId as followedId

actions_required: No additional actions are required for this application beyond queries and mutations.
